description:
A converter designed by video editors. The professional compression tool accessible to all.

Shutter Encoder is one of the best video converter software, it handles images and audio too!
It has been designed by video editors in order to be as accessible and efficient as possible.
Shutter Encoder makes use of FFmpeg to handle its encoding, allowing support for almost every codec you’ve ever heard of, and many more you haven’t.
Don’t just take our word for it though, Avid themselves recommend Shutter Encoder as part of your Media Composer and ProTools ingesting workflow!
- Added "Colorize" function
- Added "Audio separation" function
- Added 10bits colorspaces for "XAVC Long GOP" function
- Added "Force preset" checkbox for "XAVC Long GOP" function
- Added "premultiplied" option for "Enable alpha channel" checkbox
- Ability to select GPU for multi-GPU configuration
- Ability to change UI scale using the config.properties file
- Improved UI animations
- Improved "Video Player" performance
- Improved timecode writing with input point
- Fixed bug with "AI" scaling
- Fixed bug with drag & drop
- Fixed bug with .ass subtitles
- Fixed bug with preset loading
- Fixed bug with "Adapt" scale mode
- Fixed bug with "Cropping" lock icon
- Fixed bug with "Vu-meter" checkbox
- Fixed bug with "Add subtitles" checkbox
- Fixed bugs with "Video player" scrubbing
- Fixed bug with "GPU decoding" detection
- Updated 7z
